item.title: About
item.description: My name is George Fraser, I currently work for one of the largest International Banks in the world as the Director of Operational Resilience Frameworks. This role covers the development of resilience strategy and the design of globally consistent frameworks which ensure a continuous focus on resilience. Since 2006 Iâ€™ve been working to improve resilience within the financial services sector, helping to ensure that large banks meet their moral and societal expectations in the provision of banking services.
